Title: Authorizes a weighted selection process for the allocation of certain prekindergarten seats
Summary: Authorizes a weighted selection process prioritizing children who would be eligible to receive free or reduced price lunch and/or who are emergent multilingual learners for the allocation of certain prekindergarten seats in school districts where there are more eligible children than can be served in a given school year.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to authorizing a weighted selection process for the allocation of certain prekindergarten seats
